org.sql: SELECT 1 AS one FROM types INNER JOIN projects_types ON projects_types.type_id = types.id INNER JOIN projects ON projects.id = projects_types.project_id WHERE projects.id IN (SELECT projects.id FROM projects WHERE projects.lft >= 1 AND projects.lft < 2 ORDER BY projects.name ASC) AND projects.active = "$1" LIMIT 1

rewrites.sql: SELECT 1 AS one FROM types INNER JOIN projects_types ON projects_types.type_id = types.id LIMIT 1
